text:
【鸟万百子湾店】尊敬的 宋先生 您好！
已经为您预订： 鸟万. 烧鸟百子湾店
用餐日期：11月2日 周六
用餐时间：18:30
用餐人数：4人
餐区信息：板前 板7、板8、板5、板6
座位信息：
温馨提示：
请您于上述时间到店用餐，超时为您保留10分钟。 过时自动取消，请您充分考虑交通拥堵提早到店。
人数时间变更请尽早联系我们。 本店谢绝饮用中式白酒及自带食物及携宠物用餐。 感谢理解，期待您光临！
预订电话：17701212916
trans:
【ToriONE Baiziwan Branch】 Dear Mr. Song,
Your reservation has been successfully made for: ToriONE Yakitori Baiziwan Branch
Dining Date: Saturday, November 2
Dining Time: 6:30 PM
Number of Guests: 4
Dining Area: Counter seats (Counter 7, Counter 8, Counter 5, Counter 6)
Seat Information:
Kind Reminders:
Please arrive at the restaurant at the specified time. Your reservation will be held for 10 minutes. If you arrive later, the reservation will be automatically canceled. Please plan ahead considering potential traffic delays.
For any changes to the number of guests or the reservation time, please contact us as early as possible. Kindly note that the restaurant does not allow the consumption of Chinese baijiu, self-brought food, or dining with pets. Thank you for your understanding, and we look forward to serving you!
Reservation Hotline: 177-0121-2916
